trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewCancelEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck" />, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCollapse" />, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand" />, or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeSelect" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将对 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck" /> 的以下事件进行处理的方法：<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCollapse" />、<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand" />、<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeSelect" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewCancelEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewCancelEventArgs> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to change the collapse state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> so that all the checked nodes are visible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何更改的折叠状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，以便所有选中的节点都可见。

trans-unit.source: First, all the nodes are collapsed, and a handler is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 首先，所有节点均折叠都起来，并处理程序添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Next, all the nodes are expanded.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，所有节点会展开。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler determines whether a given node has child nodes that are checked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序确定在给定的节点是否具有签入的子节点。

trans-unit.source: If a node does not have checked children, the expansion is canceled for that node.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点不具有已选中的子级，则取消该节点的扩展。

trans-unit.source: In order to allow normal node expansion when the plus sign next to a node is clicked, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler is then removed.
trans-unit.target: 单击节点旁边的加号时，以便正常的节点展开<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeExpand?displayProperty=nameWithType>然后删除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can also be implemented by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, as illustrated in the example for that topic.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以通过处理实现此行为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCollapse?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，该主题的示例中所示。
